ProductInfo.Features:
EagleCam, new version with updated software and large-print manual! Hidden spy camera, hidden menu, beautiful silver or black appearance; Music/video player/FM radio
High quality video compression; 2-inch LCD QVGA screen; View recorded video directly on LCD screen, no computer needed
Loop record, super long time recording, super storage capability (up to 32G, SD card NOT included)
Infrared night vision (940 nM), crystal clear even in low light
External power supply for constant and limitless recording; Included battery for portability
ProductInfo.Name: EagleCam: Top Selling Spy Camera Mini Clock Radio Hidden DVR; Infrared Night vision; Large-Print Manual
